The opportunity to champion linguistic quality while leading the transformation of how language is built at scale is genuinely exciting. I would welcome the chance to discuss how my linguistic expertise, cultural knowledge and openness to innovation can contribute to the DACH member experience.

Thank you for considering my application.

Warm regards,

Charles Siboto
